plot: In the face of mill closures, the McBride Community Forest in central British Columbia, is using its resources to help diversify the economy by supporting value-added enterprises, and community infrastructure.
title: The McBride Community Forest
plot_es: In the face of mill closures, the McBride Community Forest in central British Columbia, is using its resources to help diversify the economy by supporting value-added enterprises, and community infrastructure.
plot_en: In the face of mill closures, the McBride Community Forest in central British Columbia, is using its resources to help diversify the economy by supporting value-added enterprises, and community infrastructure.
